summary:
*Experienced in IT Server Administration/Virtualization/Networking .

*Tech enthusiasts always wants to play with new techs and find a way to implement in production in order to reduce cost and time for company.

*B.E(Electronics & communication Engineer)
*Microsoft Certified Solution Associate (windows Server 2012 infrastructure )
*Microsoft certified Hyper-V specialist

-Well versed in Active Directory .Handled Many International Telecom servers including Zain Telecom servers. Have hands on experience in Linux, Exchange, SharePoint,vmware servers and CHECKPOINT, fortigate &pfsense firewalls 

-Successfully completed many in house projects including Active directory migration from 2003-2016

currentPositions.description: Working at Saudi German Hospital Dammam ONsite
currentPositions.title: Network System Engineer

headquarters.line1: Al Muhammadiyah District , Ibrahim Al-Ashary Street

projects.description:
In Hesham El-sewedy nortel IP Phones were used , which was causing issues frequently and its outdated product with end of support . In order to overcome these issues we replaced nortel with new Avaya IP office 500 v2 .

 -->Coordinated with supplier for project costs and setup meeting with them .
--> Setup and configure New avaya IP 1616 phones for users by replacing nortel phones. 
-->Installation and configuration of server 2012 for Avaya IP office manager.
-->Configured site to site VPN and allow required ports to communicate between branches Jeddah ,  
      Riyadh & dammam sites over Site to site VPN.
-->installed tele-tiger billing software and configured monthly reports .
--> Customize the reports based on company requirements using crystal reports .
projects.title: Avaya IPO Implementation

projects.description:
Installation and configuration of Pfsense Opensource firewall .
Configuration of Squid Proxy server for Web & Application filtering .
Configured Clamshell Anti-virus.
Configuration of Snort IPS system for network 
Configured Ntopng ,Bandwidh d to monitor bandwidth Utilization .
Create and configure Site to Site VPN between Fortigate & Pfsense using Dyanamic DNS for ERP servers connectivity with minimal network access & connected Avaya IP Phones  over VPN .
projects.title: Pfsense Firewall Implementation

projects.description:
-->Installation and configuration of Kaspersky security Center 10.
-->Migrated users from Mcafee virus enterprise scan to kaspersky endpoint .
-->Configured Kaspersky endpoint policies on security center .
-->Configured Daily scheduled updates via administrative server and update agents for branches
-->Configured App  control , Web control & Device control polices according to company requirements .
projects.title: Kaspersky Security center & Endpoint implementation

projects.description:
Remote app server was hosted using Citrix which was installed on server 2003 Physical server. Users can access apps like ERP clients ,Excel other company apps using this remote app feature .

As this old setup ,due to performance and security concerns we have to migrate to virtual and latest operating systems .So installed Esxi 6 and windows server standard 2016 on it .

-->Configured windows remote desktop services instead of citrix & configured high availablty  for connection broker , RD web access & RD session host .

-->Configured load balancing using DNS round robin method .
projects.title: Virtualization and Migration of Remote Desktop services server

projects.description:
Our environment was multiple domain structure with multiple sites in 2003 domain environment. Where root domain not in use additional domain is in use as primary , So without root domain additional domain cannot authenticate. 

1.Additional domain controller (server 2016) was in the domain environment for a month , dns queries were redirected to new ad for authentication . 
2.Later then Migrated FSMO roles from 2003 to 2016 domain control.Make additional domain as a root domain.
3.Removed 2003 additional domain controller from the domain and created 2016 ADC's  at different sites.
4.Raised domain and forest functional level to server 2008
5.Migrated replication status from FRS to DFRS replication as FRS were deprecated .
6.Created DR site using veeam backup and replication
projects.title: Domain Migration ( Server 2003 to Server 2016)

projects.description:
Regular VPN access is no longer a secure channel for the communication between endpoints and the company network . So next level of security is needed which is zero trust network access. Using Fortinet Endpoint management system we defined security policies and tags .In order to create successful VPN connection endpoints should meet the criteria defined by polices  which will award a complaint tag.

1.Installation and configuration of Fortinet EMS.
2.define tags ,policies on Forti EMS according to company requirements.
3.Integerate FortiEMS with FortiGate and configured  VPN complaint policy.
4.Configure backup for FortiEMS.
projects.title: Fortinet ZTNA

headline: Network & System Engineer @ Megamind IT Solutions | MCSA

Fortinet Network Security Expert Level 2: Certified Associate

commentary.text: Hi umaish, i have been following you since your Cissp prep. Juts need small clarification. if it was an attack. Data first lose its confidentiality right ? Am just asking. As you are certified, your clarification would be helpful to understand. 🙂
Availability can be fixed using backup. First it was an attack so it lost it's confidentiality first. Then if data was deleted before backup then comes availability.
Congrats on zoho's new datacentre in Saudi. Interested to be a part of zoho. Please share us career portal info for mena region if available.
